title: He Did communicate with his team, it's his ADC who refuse to communicate with him...

embed.description: Riot Games says they will perma ban Highest Mastery Points Singed, AdellaideSkyhart if he continues to play Support Smite Singed due to it negatively effected his team mates. He has been reported a number of times because of his non-meta playstyle. Do you think he deserves to be perma banned or even constantly suspended?

body:
Seriously, fuck ADC players,

Assassins nerfed, this {{champion:67}} bitch, balance around ADC, even supports player start hating adc by going mages bottom just to slap their face.

replies.body: The same kids who will cry about the jungler never ganking them are the same ones that think it's cool for "support" to just leave bot lane to 1v2 while you go run around as Singed. Such a weird community.
Not according to Riot's new definition of "communicating **with** the team rather than **at** the team" which apparently means doing whatever your team wants if they complain hard enough.

> [{quoted}](name=emernic,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BGakcTic,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-17T18:03:39.022+0000)
>
> Not according to Riot's new definition of "communicating **with** the team rather than **at** the team" which apparently means doing whatever your team wants if they complain hard enough.

That is how team games work, yes. Majority rules.

Play with friends who are on the same page if you want to fuck around.

Why are we always blaming the adc? It is just vayne being abusively op. Plus, if I qued as adc,I do not want this singed on my team because trying to even cs in a 1v2 lane is extremely difficult, espicially if I play ashe.
